hero.subtitle: JUCE-based audio sampler with granular synthesis, tremolo effects, and professional DSP processing. Perfect for music producers and sound designers.

features.title: Professional Audio Processing
features.subtitle: Everything you need for creative sound manipulation

f1.title: Drag & Drop Loading
f1.desc: Seamlessly load audio files (WAV, AIFF, MP3) with intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Instant waveform visualization and playback control.

f2.title: Granular Synthesis
f2.desc: Advanced granular synthesis mode for textural manipulation. Control grain size, random playback, and crossfade transitions for unique sound design.

f3.title: Custom Tremolo Effect
f3.desc: Manual DSP implementation with LFO calculation and per-sample amplitude modulation. Full control over rate and depth parameters.

f4.title: Filter System
f4.desc: High/Low-pass filtering with real-time parameter control. Frequency range from 20Hz to 20kHz for precise tonal shaping.

f5.title: Built-in Compressor
f5.desc: Professional compressor with full parameter automation. Control threshold, ratio, attack, and release for dynamic range management.

f6.title: Advanced Looping
f6.desc: User-defined loop regions with tempo adjustment (20-300 BPM). Perfect for creating rhythmic patterns and sustained textures.

f7.title: Dual Waveform Display
f7.desc: Offline and real-time waveform visualization. Monitor your audio processing with professional-grade visual feedback.

f8.title: Volume Safety System
f8.desc: Built-in peak protection with automatic detection. Prevents audio damage with smart volume monitoring and safety alerts.

f9.title: Full Automation
f9.desc: AudioProcessorValueTreeState for complete parameter automation. All controls can be automated in your DAW for dynamic performances.

cta.subtitle: Download AudioQ now and explore professional audio sampling and granular synthesis.
